Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Establishes a Native nation consultation policy
Summary: Directs the secretary of state to establish a Native nation consultation policy used by state agencies in instances where a proposal by such agency that would affect indigenous communities is under consideration.
LawCode: Add Art 15-D ยง328-d, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing a Native nation consultation policy
